publication.title: Simulated Microgravity Induces Regionally Distinct Neurovascular and Structural Remodeling of Skeletal Muscle and Cutaneous Arteries in the Rat

results.effect: increased in forelimb arteries but decreased in the sural artery

results.target: maximal contractile responses to noradrenaline and serotonin
results.effect: increased in forelimb but decreased in hindlimb skeletal muscle feed arteries
increased in the saphenous artery but not in the sural artery
